item.title: Welcome to my Knowledgebase
item.description: üëã Hi there! Welcome to my digital knowledge base‚Äîa curated collection of my learning journey in cybersecurity, networking, AI, and more. This is where I document my notes, methodologies, and experiments as I explore the world of technology.

item.title: Phishing Email
item.description: About Your email address has been leaked and you receive an email from Paypal in German. Try to analyze the suspicious email. File location: C:\Users\LetsDefend\Desktop\Files\PhishingChallenge.zip Password: infected This challenge prepared by @Fuuji Walkthroughs: DFIR Challenge - Phishing Email Phishing Email Challenge & Step-by-Step SOC Alert Investigations Phishing Email Challenge by LetsDefend E-mail Analysis - A LetsDefend Challenge Questions What is the return path of the email? ‚Üí bounce@rjttznyzjjzydnillquh.designclub.uk.com What is the domain name of the url in this mail? ‚Üí storage.googleapis.com Is the domain mentioned in the previous question suspicious? ‚Üí yes What is the body SHA-256 of the domain? ‚Üí 13945ecc33afee74ac7f72e1d5bb73050894356c4bf63d02a1a53e76830567f5 Is this email a phishing email? ‚Üí Yes Analysis The file contained the copy of email which was sent to us.

item.title: SOC146
item.description: Alert ‚≠ê This alert was generated from a real phishing attack. EventID : 93 Event Time : Jun, 13, 2021, 02:13 PM Rule : SOC146 - Phishing Mail Detected - Excel 4.0 Macros Level : Security Analyst SMTP Address : 24.213.228.54 Source Address : trenton@tritowncomputers.com Destination Address : lars@letsdefend.io E-mail Subject : RE: Meeting Notes Device Action : Allowed Attachment : 11f44531fb088d31307d87b01e8eabff Password: infected Analysis Virustotal Results: Attachment: 32/66 Domain: 0/94 IP Address: 0/94 Email Delivered: True Attachment Opened: False Report A malicious zip file was sent to lars@letsdefend.io by trenton@tritowncomputers.com on June 13 2021.
